altername_name: 死霊戦線 War of the Dead Part 2
name: Shiryou Sensen 2: War of the Dead Part 2
overview: Shiryō Sensen 2 - War of the Dead Part 2 is a sequel to Shiryō Sensen - War of the Dead. Gameplay-wise, it is quite different from its predecessor. RPG elements such as a "world map", random encounters, heavy weapon and item management, etc. have been completely removed. The game is played entirely from top-down perspective, taking place in various districts of the large city. The gameplay can be described as a mixture of adventure and action elements. Laila has to explore the city, talk to characters, and sometimes procure items necessary to unlock a new location and advance the story. Combat is rather sparse, and is restricted to one enemy at a time. Battle mechanics are much simpler than in the first game, with Laila having only one gun, unlimited ammunition, and no jumping or ducking abilities.
